title: Need Advice on Design/font
content:
I'm building a new website, and I'm concerned about the red text (the lists) and the comments below them. They just aren't particularly appealing, and it looks too cluttered.

Any suggestions to improve this would be appreciated. Thanks!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/w7aQwBg.jpg[/img]
author: icor1031
